Package com.github.i49.hibiscus.validation

Provides a JSON validator and its supporting types.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JsonValidator
    A core interface to be used to validate JSON documents against specified schema.
    ValidationResult
    A interface to inspect the result of the validation of JSON document.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicJsonValidator
    An implementation class of JsonValidator interface and the base class of all custom JSON validators.

Package com.github.i49.hibiscus.validation Description

Provides a JSON validator and its supporting types.

The core interface to be used to validate JSON documents against specified schema is JsonValidator. This interface is implemented by BasicJsonValidator class which is provided by this package also. This class is intended to be extended by application developers to build their own validators which have application specific schema.

All validation methods provided by JsonValidator will return an object implementing ValidationResult interface as result of the validation.

See Also:
JsonValidator, BasicJsonValidator, ValidationResult
